author: Kasiworx Kasimedia
comment: Ok but not so user friendly

author: RJ McKenzie
comment: It works well except when you don't check in with the venues it gives you the first time.  If you don't check in and just back out of the app, those venues will be the only ones it will ever give you, no matter how far you move.  Please fix this issue.

reply.author: David Vávra
reply.content: Hi, can you please add it to issues here? https://github.com/destil/wearsquare/issues

title: Great app with a small issue.

author: BILAL POSTACI
comment: It is nice and simple application. But I would like to put an icon to my checkin. I hope this will happen in next releases.

reply.author: David Vávra
reply.content: I just released an update which includes stickers!

title: Good app.

author: Joe Katon
comment: First off, I recommend Swipify launcher instead of Wear Mini. However, any app launcher is highly recommended. It's great seeing apps take advantage of the new Foursquare (not just the Swarm side). It's too bad that the check in side keeps crashing. I would like to see the add-on on the phone side app to build in a setting to include Twitter and Facebook in the Swarm Check in. It is available on other Android Wear Apps. Overall, good job. Well thought out. +JoeKaton  Update: have seen the Beta side which solves the crash. Good work. I look forward to seeing the final and future updates.

reply.author: David Vávra
reply.content: The crash should be fixed in new version, the Facebook/Twitter integration is going to be implemented soon.

title: Nice UI. Could use a few features and fixes.

author: Marc Lee
comment: Thanks for adding the Facebook and Twitter sharing. I bought you a beer ☺... It seems that Facebook sharing only worked once for me. Twitter sharing is working every time.

reply.author: David Vávra
reply.content: Thanks! Can you repeat the issue with Facebook? If so, add it as issue here: https://github.com/destil/wearsquare/issues

title: Great...

author: Jinzhou Yeow
comment: Swarm check in worked fine, but doesn't appear on Facebook even though the settings have been made.

reply.author: David Vávra
reply.content: You need to enable it in Swarm settings. Have you checked the pairing Swarm-Facebook works?

title: Facebook check in doesn't seem to work

author: Erie T
comment: Works great, wished we don't need Foursquare app though, since it's no longer used for check-ins, only the app Swarm.

reply.author: David Vávra
reply.content: Hi, Foursquare is needed for authentication. I use Foursquare accounts. And my app is doing both checkins (Swarm) and exploring (4sq).

title: Good

author: Daniel Marcinkowski
comment: That's exactly what I have been waiting for! Great app
title: Yes!

comment: .... Have a look at how easy it is to do a good and working wear app!! .only issue is the start name.... It most if the times let me end up searching for "check in"... Haha

reply.author: David Vávra
reply.content: Hi, do you have some suggestion for the start name?

title: Tell foursquare and swarm to....

author: Michael Spick
comment: The app never loads, both exploring and check in hang with the loading screen. Has never worked since install.

reply.author: David Vávra
reply.content:
I'm sad to hear that. Did you try to swipe the loading right and try again? I will try to get to the bottom of this.
It would be best if you add issue here: https://github.com/destil/WearSquare/issues (we can continue discussion there)

title: Good concept, app doesn't work

reply.author: David Vávra
reply.content: Why? Please give me more feedback.
